root.name: enableStyle()

example.code: # The file "bot.svg" must be in the data folder # of the current sketch to load successfully s = loadShape("bot.svg") s.disableStyle() shape(s, -30, 10, 80, 80) s.enableStyle() shape(s, 50, 10, 80, 80)

root.description: Enables the shape's style data and ignores Processing's current styles. Styles include attributes such as colors, stroke weight, and stroke joints.

parameter.label: sh
parameter.description: PShape: any variable of type PShape
